title: [Self-Directed] Language Learning Design Based on Visual Schematic Representation and Cognitive Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language structure understanding and clerical work experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment, emphasizing language skills applicable to document writing/interpretation tasks in the workplace.

learning_goals: Learners can compare three visual diagramming methods (LT/RoCS/GRF) and apply them to appropriate contexts
Learners can diagnose their cognitive styles (visual/verbal, global/analytical) and develop personalized learning strategies
Learners can interpret document information with over 80% accuracy through GRF or LT-based diagramming

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
